dsOverview.title: Nicholson's Africa Precipitation, monthly 1901-1984

summary.p: Sharon Nicholson at Florida State University compiled this dataset of monthly rainfall totals for African stations. The period covered is 1901 to 1984.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: FSU/METEO > Meteorology Department, Florida State University

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount

reference.title: Revised rainfall series for the West African subtropics
